backend/main.mo: Defines a canister actor with suit stats, module toggles, environmental hazard systems, life support, and related system state structures.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function copying module toggle values from an old actor structure to a new one.
feature_evidence.json: Describes feature evidence linking frontend files to maintaining stable module toggle UI behavior via backend-refetched state.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference or tooling.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and HUD color styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting meta tags, PWA icons, manifest, and root mounting point.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, icons, and display settings.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing caching, cache versioning, fetch handling, and offline fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing boot sequence, tab routing, display modes, backend module-state syncing, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/audio/audioBus.ts: Audio bus utility handling UI SFX and voice playback with audio unlock logic and fallback safety.
frontend/src/audio/hevVoice.ts: Provides HEV-style voice playback helpers triggered by suit events, gated by the voiceEnabled setting.
frontend/src/audio/uiSfx.ts: Plays UI sound effects for tab switches, toggles, and other interactions when voiceEnabled is active.
frontend/src/components/audio/AmbiencePl: A UI audio player for ambient tracks with playback controls, looping, volume, and custom track uploads.
frontend/src/components/boot/BootSequenc: Runs a staged boot animation with typing effects, sound cues, fade-out, and a completion callback.
frontend/src/components/common/HudSwitch: A thin wrapper around a Switch component adding HUD-specific styling.
frontend/src/components/hazards/Environm: Displays hazard levels with icons and status classes based on readings from the hazards store.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudGlobalEff: Renders global HUD visual effects including bloom, critical overlay, and presence glow with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudLayout.ts: Main HUD container applying color scheme, scaling, orientation logic, global effects, and header/footer layout.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudOfflineOv: Shows a warning overlay indicating the HUD system is offline with instructions to restore it.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudTabsBar.t: Enhanced tabs bar showing category icons and status indicators derived from suit, hazards, weapons, and settings state.
frontend/src/components/hud/MinimalHudVi: Renders a minimal HUD with stat panels and a button to restore the standard display mode, updating logs and playing audio cues.
frontend/src/components/hud/Panels.tsx: Provides reusable HUD panel components including generic, stat, meter, and vitals panels with styling and status logic.
frontend/src/components/hud/TacticalHudS: Defines the tactical HUD layout with sidebars, reticle, and embedded stat panels while rendering child content in the center.
frontend/src/components/hud/TacticalOver: Displays an always-on-screen tactical overlay with frames, reticle, and various static readout elements.
frontend/src/components/info/CommandCons: Implements an interactive command console with history, execution handling, logging, and keyboard navigation.
frontend/src/components/info/ConfirmActi: Provides a confirmation dialog wrapper triggering sound effects and callbacks on confirm or cancel.
frontend/src/components/info/OperatorPro: Shows static operator identity and suit profile details in a styled HUD panel.
frontend/src/components/info/SuitSubsyst: Displays suit subsystem statuses with toggles for HUD, radio, voice, and display mode, using confirmation prompts and logging.
frontend/src/components/info/SystemLogVi: Renders the system log with timestamps and types inside a scrollable view.
frontend/src/components/medical/MedicalD: Renders a medical diagram image with colored overlays showing head, torso, and arm status based on health and armor values.
frontend/src/components/medical/MedicalI: Provides interactive medical panels with neural stats and toggleable advanced medical systems, updating logs and suit state.
frontend/src/components/medical/MedicalR: Displays vital signs and trauma metrics derived from suit stats and hazard levels, with dynamic health-based calculations.
frontend/src/components/medical/panels/E: Implements an SOS control panel with arming, spoofing, and test-burst actions, updating system logs and displaying beacon status.
frontend/src/components/medical/panels/L: Shows integrity, load, and calibration state for each limb, allowing calibration toggling and logging changes.
frontend/src/components/tactical/RadarPa: Draws an animated radar sweep with deterministic contacts on a canvas and displays basic range info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to internet identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoUiScale.ts: Provides a hook that computes a responsive UI scale based on viewport width and updates on resize and orientation changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHudPresence.ts: Tracks pointer/touch presence and updates CSS variables for reactive HUD effects using requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for managing authentication state, login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps react-query hooks for fetching and updating suit stats and module states, including optimistic updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useReducedMotion.ts: Detects the user's reduced‑motion preference via matchMedia and returns a boolean.
frontend/src/hooks/useViewportOrientatio: Determines whether the viewport is in landscape orientation and updates on orientation or size changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles, HUD color palettes, CSS variables, and custom switch styling.
frontend/src/lib/commands.ts: Parses console-style commands to update suit stats, hazards, modules, system settings, and logs responses.
frontend/src/lib/glyphs.ts: Exports a set of text‑safe glyphs for hazards, indicators, and directional symbols.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider and renders App.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers a service worker on window load and logs success or failure.
frontend/src/state/audioState.ts: Zustand audio store managing playlist, playback controls, volume, looping, and custom tracks.
frontend/src/state/hazardAlerts.ts: Monitors hazard levels periodically to trigger critical flashing and throttled voice alerts.
frontend/src/state/hazardsState.ts: Zustand store tracking individual hazard levels with helpers for aggregate level and status.
frontend/src/state/infoSettingsState.ts: Zustand store for UI, HUD, voice, and display settings with update actions and reset.
frontend/src/state/suitState.ts: Zustand store holding suit stats and module states with setters, toggles, and reset.
frontend/src/state/systemLog.ts: Zustand log store supporting adding timestamped entries and clearing the log.
frontend/src/state/uiState.ts: Zustand store for toggling landscape mode and resetting UI state.
frontend/src/state/weaponSystemsState.ts: Zustand store managing selected weapon, ammo type, and fire rate with reset.
frontend/src/tabs/BasicsTab.tsx: Renders core suit statistics, environmental hazards panel, and vitals overview.
frontend/src/tabs/HazardsTab.tsx: Displays detailed hazard breakdowns, trends, filters, and environmental statistics.
frontend/src/tabs/InfoTab.tsx: Shows operator profile, subsystem readouts, system log, and command console panels.
frontend/src/tabs/MedicalTab.tsx: Renders medical readouts and interactive medical control panels.
frontend/src/tabs/SettingsTab.tsx: Provides UI to modify HUD, voice, system, and suit settings and perform system reset.
frontend/src/tabs/TacticalTab.tsx: Renders the tactical HUD tab with radar, readouts, and a static contact list using various HUD components.
frontend/src/tabs/UtilitiesTab.tsx: Displays module toggle controls and an ambience player, using backend module state and toggle mutations with audio feedback.
frontend/src/tabs/WeaponsTab.tsx: Provides a weapons tab with selectable weapons and collapsible details sourced from a static weapon dataset.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, spacing, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Project state file describing issue context, known problems, and a pending feature request for backend module state persistence.
